content:
Is this the correct usage of enableWhen I have only seen it with true/false

enableWhen": [
    {
    "question": "risk_group",
    "operator": "=",
    "answerCoding": {
        "code": "very low",
        "display": "very low",
        "system": "http://sunquest.info/fhir/value"
    }
    }
],
So long as there's a question with a linkId of 'risk_group', that should be correct.
